name: Walker & Co Brands, Inc
description: Manufacturer of health and beauty products intended to build the consumer-centric health and beauty product to inspire consumer loyalty. The company's health and beauty products includes moisturizing shave and hair care collection that help reduce shaving irritation and razor bumps and the products are thoroughly coactive, formulations actively work together, enabling users to get keep their skin and hair happy and to help their hair feel healthier.
